User Conference

San Diego | June 19-20 2019

The Conference

Participating Companies

With inspiring keynotes, outstanding education sessions, and valuable networking opportunities the CipherHealth Partners in Excellence Conference 2019 will showcase best practices and proven strategies to achieve the results your team desires. Join your CipherHealth peers for 1 Â½ days of collaboration, training, and learning to advance your skills, achieve superior engagement, and care coordination across the continuum.

Partner Award

Submit Nomination

A prize for the thought leaders among us

The CipherHealth Partner Awards recognize clients who have achieved excellence in outcomes and/or use CipherHealth solutions in innovative ways. This is a unique opportunity to hear from high achieving clients who are innovating with the use of our products, reaching organizational goals, and improving the patient and family experience.

Submission Deadline

Address

HILTON RESORT & SPA

The Hotel

We will be hosting the event at the lovely Hilton Resort & Spa in sunny San Diego.

We have reserved a block of rooms at a special rate of $179/night + tax. The discounted rate will be available until January 9th, or until the block sells out, whichever comes first. To book your room please click here or call 619-276-4010 and mention the Group Code CIP118.

Daytime parking is self-parking. Please click here for a map of the daytime parking lot. Daytime parking rates: $5 up to 3 hours, $8 for 3-6 hours, $12 for 6-18 hours.

We have a discounted overnight parking rate of $20/night. All parking is self-parking and located throughout the Resort. At check-in, guests will receive a parking gate key and a pass to put in their cars.
